findings.title: Insecure approve() Implementation
findings.description: The ERC-20 standard has a security vulnerability related to the `approve()` method being vulnerable to race-condition.

findings.title: Fee charging tokens break integration with third-party protocols
findings.description: Tokens that charge a fee for operations are incompatible with a number of third-party protocols, such as the liquidity pools of many automatic market makers and other DeFi protocols.
